mapper.select: select events.*,Users.firstname,Users.middlename ,Users.lastname,Users.client_id_no, Organisations.org_code,Organisations.org_name from (select * from Events where created_user_id=#{user_id} or event.assigned_to=#{user_id}) events left join Users on events.client_id = Users.id left join Organisations on events.org_id = Organisations.id

update Events set firsteventcmtname=#{event.eventcmt}, client_id=#{event.client_id}, org_id=#{event.org_id}, assigned_to=#{event.assigned_to}, eventdate=#{event.eventdate}, startTimeStr = #{event.startTimeStr}, startTimeStr = #{event.endTimeStr}, starttime=#{event.startTime}, endtime=#{event.endTime}, reportstatus=#{event.reportStatus} modified_user_id=#{event.modified_user_id}, modified_time=now() where id=#{event.id};
